## 🐛 Bug Description
A clear and concise description of the bug.

## 🔄 Steps to Reproduce
1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

## 📱 Expected Behavior
A clear description of what you expected to happen.

## 🖥️ Actual Behavior
What actually happened.

- **OS**: [e.g., Windows 11, macOS 12.1, Ubuntu 20.04]
